name: stg_campaigns
description: Staging model for marketing campaign data. Reads raw campaign performance data from Parquet files, including base attributes and derived performance metrics like CTR, CPC, and ROAS. This model serves as the foundation for downstream campaign analysis.

columns.name: Campaign_ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the marketing campaign.

columns.name: Target_Audience
columns.description: Description of the intended audience demographic for the campaign (e.g., 'Women 45-60', 'All Ages').

columns.name: Campaign_Goal
columns.description: The primary objective of the campaign (e.g., 'Product Launch', 'Brand Awareness', 'Increase Sales').

columns.name: Duration
columns.description: The length of the campaign, likely in days.

columns.name: Channel_Used
columns.description: The marketing channel used for the campaign (e.g., 'Pinterest', 'Twitter', 'Instagram').

columns.name: Conversion_Rate
columns.description: The rate at which interactions resulted in a desired action (e.g., purchase, sign-up), expressed as a decimal.

columns.name: Acquisition_Cost
columns.description: The cost associated with acquiring a customer or achieving the campaign goal through this campaign.

columns.name: ROI
columns.description: Return On Investment for the campaign, calculated based on revenue and cost.

columns.name: Location
columns.description: The geographical location targeted or associated with the campaign.

columns.name: Language
columns.description: The primary language used in the campaign materials.

columns.name: Clicks
columns.description: The total number of clicks generated by the campaign.

columns.name: Impressions
columns.description: The total number of times the campaign ad was displayed.

columns.name: Engagement_Score
columns.description: A metric indicating the level of user interaction with the campaign content.

columns.name: Customer_Segment
columns.description: The specific customer segment targeted by the campaign (e.g., 'Fashion').

columns.name: Date
columns.description: The original date associated with the campaign data record.

columns.name: Company
columns.description: The company running the marketing campaign.

columns.name: CTR
columns.description: Derived Metric: Click-Through Rate (Clicks / Impressions).

columns.name: CPC
columns.description: Derived Metric: Cost Per Click (Acquisition_Cost / Clicks).

columns.name: ROAS
columns.description: Derived Metric: Return On Ad Spend.

columns.name: StandardizedDate
columns.description: Derived Field: Standardized date value derived from the original 'Date' field, potentially cleaned or truncated.
